name: SPY Momentum Strategy Backtest
question: How would a 12-month momentum strategy have performed on SPY over the last 10 years?
retailQuestion: Would buying SPY when it's trending up have made me money?
description: Backtests a momentum strategy on SPY that buys when 12-month returns are positive and sells when negative. Analyzes historical performance, risk metrics, and drawdowns to evaluate the strategy's effectiveness compared to buy-and-hold. Includes transaction costs and realistic entry/exit timing.

workflow.description: Step 1: Get 10+ years of SPY daily price data for momentum calculation
Step 2: Get current SPY market data for context and validation
Step 3: Calculate 12-month rolling returns and generate buy/sell signals
Step 4: Backtest strategy performance with transaction costs and timing
Step 5: Compare strategy vs buy-and-hold performance and calculate risk metrics
